content.rendered:
It’s your money – only faster!

The Office of Student Accounts encourages all students to sign up for Direct Deposit. Once enrolled, all future refunds will be automatically deposited to a checking or saving account at the bank of your choice.

Benefits include:

  • Quick and convenient
  • No more waiting for your check in the mail
  • Absolutely no charge to you for the electronic deposit service
  • Eliminates the possibility of your check being lost or stolen and forged
  • Safety and confidentiality are assured with electronic transfer
  • You don’t have to go to the bank to cash or deposit a check

Are you ready to start enjoying the benefits of direct deposit of your student refunds? Follow these easy steps to begin receiving your student refunds faster.

  • Go to La Verne Portal and login with your username and email password.
  • Click on the Student Services & Financial aid.
  • Click on the My Student Account Center link. This will open a new tab.
  • Scroll down to “Sign up for Direct Deposit Refunds!”:, then click on Sign up to review your options

Additional tutorials and instructions can be found here.

If you need help, please email us at stuaccts@laverne.edu.
